TopicTitle: Quantum struts mod, can't get working. Please help!

Articles.Content:
Been away from this game for quite a while (since 0.22) and trying to get all my mods updated. I've been having a lot of trouble finding any information on the forums or even from google about this mod that I used to use a lot. I tried the old spaceport download link but when I added it, the quantum struts just don't appear in the parts list (sandbox mode, so I know its not a tech tree issue).

I couple of threads I have seen have popped up in searches referencing work on 'Quantam struts continued,' but I can't seem to find anything solid about that either.

If anyone could help, my new space stations thank you in advance.

That's odd. The thread is inaccessible, which makes no sense because it wasn't in the old Add-on Requests and Support forum.

I haven't actually used it since 0.24 was released, but I'm fairly certain there was a compatibility update.

You could try asking a moderator to move the thread by posting a request here. That request might have to come from the most recent maintainers, toadicus and K3|Chris.
KAS has a similar feature and it seems to work for 0.24.2
I think the Infernal Robotics rework also has something similar, though I have not tried it myself.

The features in KAS and IR are nothing like quantum struts. Quantum struts automatically activate and deactivate and are small and thin. For KAS you have large ugly struts you need to place in EVA manually.

Edited September 12, 2014 by raidernick

The struts included with IR Rework can be decoupled, but ZodiusInfuser also provided the models for ActiveStruts. ActiveStruts don't require EVA, but they're also not infinitely strong. They don't automatically deploy following docking (very useful for cargo struts), but you can change the attachment point at any time.

Someone did Quantum Struts Continued but the thread got nuked in the last forum changes. I should have the download on my PC.

Edit: I have it, whom can I toss it to for uploading somewhere? The last person to touch it only patched some minor thing, possibly just to remove the version check. Works fine in .24.2

Edited September 12, 2014 by Galane

And the answer is here.

No license, so All Rights Reserved is presumed, meaning we can't redistribute it and the thread won't be accessible unless one of the maintainers updates it and makes that request.
Yeah, sorry guys, you'll have to spam K3|Chris's inbox, er I mean ask him politely to update it, all it needs is a license in the download and on the forum page.

Andy Wilkinson "Toadicus" last worked on it 2014-07-17 according to the last entry on the git with the source. Oh, same person doing Tweakable Eveyrthing, Galaxy Generator, Adaptive Docking Node and more. Last activity was three weeks ago.

KAS support was also added.

Edited September 13, 2014 by Galane
I don't mean to zombie an old thread but thought I would see if anyone here was able to get a working version of the quantum struts to work with .25?

Here's the forum thread for it:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93818
